text: ēvāyehi ovun (ætuḷu vū vahāma) “apagē allāh deviyan vahansa! oba itāmat pariśuddhavantayeki. (oba itāmat pariśuddhavantayeki)” yayi pavasannāha. ehi (tamangē mituranva hamu vana sǣmaviṭama) “salāmun (aleyikum)” yayi śūbha pætum karannāha. avasānayēdī “praśaṁsā siyalla sakala lōkayan siyalla utpādanaya kara, pōṣaṇaya kara, saṁvardhanaya kara, paripālanayakarannā vū allāhṭama ayitiya” yayi (praśaṁsā kara) suviśuddha karamin siṭinnāha
